thread.title: Location to die for
thread.title_full: Location to die for - Review of Grand Hotel Leveque, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: BiankaBeatrice
title: Location to die for
text:
I am very fond of not travelling long distances with cabs or public transport whenever I go to a holiday. I love walking and admiring the attractions and the culture of any city. That's why this hotel has marvellous location, just a few blocks away from the city's symbol- the Eiffel Tower. It is right next to a Market Street in Paris where one can see the typical outdoor French cafes. The hotel is quite small, but very good for a short stay if one wants to spend more time outside in the centre of Paris.
Room Tip: Location to kill for, excellent accessibility to Paris city centre See more room tips
